subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: Possible cognate found in {{cog|hmx-pro|*ntsi̯ouˣ||early}}, whence {{cog|mww|ntxov}} and {{cog|ium|nziou}} ({{zh-ref|Baxter and Sagart, 2014}}; {{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}), and {{cog|tai-pro|*ɟa:wᶜ||early morning}}, whence {{cog|th|เช้า}} and {{cog|khb|ᦋᧁᧉ}}.

|ma=y

|mn_note=chá - vernacular; chái - vernacular (for certain words); chó͘/chó - literary
|mn-t=za2
|w=2tsau
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n,a,adv,intj
}}
